p: The MTT assay was used to determine the cytotoxic effect of R. carthamoides essential oil from hairy roots and the roots of soil-grown plants (range: 0–3200 μg/mL) after 24 h incubation with astrocytes (Figure 1). The viability of cells was decreased below 60% at the higher concentration of essential oils, above 1600 μg/mL (Figure 1).
